data.title: Nettwerk Music Group
data.text:
News

SOUTHERN RnB CROONER LAELAND ANNOUNCES NEW EP ‘MESSMORE’ (OUT NOV 1)

By Bailey Vigliaturo |

Today, Mississippi-based rapper-singer-producer Laeland announces his new EP MESSMORE, out via Nettwerk November 1. Building on the momentum of his 2023 album look at the mess we made, the MESSMORE EP further envelops the many types of “mess” that inform our lives, while making a sonic and spiritual return to his roots in R&B. Since children, we’re taught all the variations of the…

Read More

Alisa Xayalith (of The Naked And Famous) Signs with Nettwerk + Shares New Single “Roses”

By Bailey Vigliaturo |

Today, New Zealand-born, Los Angeles-based artist Alisa Xayalith prepares to unearth emotional depths with her new single “Roses.” This highly anticipated track, which marks her debut with Nettwerk, starts a new chapter in the solo career of The Naked and Famous frontwoman, offering a deeper dive into her cinematic, indie-electro-pop resonance. On “Roses,” Xayalith invites listeners to embrace the messy beauty of…

Read More

NEIGHBORHOOD LIBRARIES ANNOUNCES NEW ALBUM ‘DEPARTURES’

By Bailey Vigliaturo |

Vancouver-based neo-classical Taylor Swindells, the composer, producer, and film scorer behind the pseudonym Neighborhood Libraries, announces his new album, Departures, out October 4, with single “Keflavik.” This album, born from a transformative summer in the Netherlands, is set to captivate listeners with its lush, evocative soundscapes and deep emotional resonance. “Last summer, my partner and I packed up…

Read More

IDER Share New Single “You Don’t Know How To Drive”

By Bailey Vigliaturo |

IDER share their new single “You Don’t Know How to Drive”. It follows previously released “Unlearn,” and “Girl,” both outings marking a glossier and immersive new direction for the duo, with their dazzling, singular fusion of euphoric dance nuggets meets luscious pop arrangements on full display. The British duo, made up of Megan Markwick and…

Read More

Fiji Blue Reveals Title for Debut Album, Announces Asia/NA Tour Dates

By Bailey Vigliaturo |

Nettwerk is thrilled to announce the signing of “bittersweet optimist” indie pop singer-songwriter Fiji Blue. Today, the LA-via-Phoenix artist announces his debut album, Glide, as well as new tour dates in Asia and North America. Born Trevor Dering, Fiji Blue finds creative solitude in the mixture of guitar-heavy storytelling, drawing inspiration from artists like Stevie Ray Vaughan &…

Read More

april june Shares ‘Baby’s Out Of Luck Again’ EP + “carry you on my broken wings” music video

By Bailey Vigliaturo |

Today, dream-pop artist april june unveils her stunning sophomore EP baby’s out of luck again, a captivating blend of storytelling and musical prowess that’s filled with the raw intensity that defines her singular artistry. Leading the charge is the new washed-out, exhilaratingly up-tempo single “carry you on my broken wings” that steps into the seductive underworld of Italian gangster movies, telling a…

Read More

WILD RIVERS Shares New Album ‘Never Better’ Out Today!

By Bailey Vigliaturo |

Never Better, the anticipated new album from Platinum-selling trio Wild Rivers—Khalid Yassein, Devan Glover and Andrew Oliver—is out today on Nettwerk Music Group. Stream/purchase HERE. In conjunction with the release, a new video for the title track is debuting today. Watch/share the video, directed by Hannah Gray Hall and produced by Weird Candy, HERE. Produced by Gabe Wax (Soccer Mommy, Adrienne Lenker) and recorded in Joshua Tree,…

Read More

Afternoon Bike Ride’s tender spring Signs to Nettwerk, Announces ‘you are now listening to a tender spring’ LP

By Bailey Vigliaturo |

Nettwerk is thrilled to announce the signing of Montreal beatmaker/instrumentalist tender spring, who some may know as 1/3 of the Canadian indie band Afternoon Bike Ride. Today, tender spring announces his first Nettwerk album you are now listening to a tender spring, and shares the first portion of the record you are now listening to a tender spring (side a). Born David Tanton, the…

Read More

TENDER reveal trippy new single ‘cutting grass’ off upcoming album ‘Flux’ out Sept 6

By Bailey Vigliaturo |

TENDER, the magnetic indie electronic pop duo coming out of Brighton and London, today reveals their new single ‘cutting grass’ from their upcoming third album, ‘Flux’. The album is set for release on 6th September, while the single will be available from 26th July via Nettwerk. ‘cutting grass’ balances danceability with eeriness, pairing acoustic instruments with an ecosystem of synths…

Read More

Swedish-Greek folk artist Plàsi Unveils New EP ‘Salamina’

By Bailey Vigliaturo |

Today, Swedish-Greek folk artist Plàsi unveils his highly anticipated EP, Salamina, via Nettwerk. Joined by producer Björn Yttling (Lykke Li, Peter Björn & John, First Aid Kit), this collection of songs marks a significant turning point in Plàsi’s artistic journey, as he ventures beyond his signature sound and embraces a bold new direction. The inspiration for Salamina sprouted on the idyllic shores of the…
